#summary How to build SW application in Android with rdfonthego

= Introduction =

 This example shows you how to build a simple Android app with RDFOnthego.

 The source code is <a href='http://rdfonthego.googlecode.com/files/Example.rar'>here.<a>


= Details =
 In this example, we used RDF store to store the foaf profile. Foaf profiles are converted to n-triples by sindice any23 api. To avoid type the URL,we are using QRCode scanner api. The QRCode generator plug-in for FireFog is easily found by google.com, and QRCode scanner for android at android market.

To get foaf id:

scan.setOnClickListener(new Button.OnClickListener(){
 @Override
 
 public void onClick(View v){

 Intent intent = new Intent("com.google.zxing.client.android.SCAN");

 intent.putExtra("SCAN_MODE", "QR_CODE_MODE");

 startActivityForResult(intent, 0);} 
 });
}
	

@Override

public void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent intent){

 super.onActivityResult(requestCode, resultCode,intent);

 if (requestCode == 0){
   if (resultCode == RESULT_OK){
        foafURL = intent.getStringExtra("SCAN_RESULT");    
        new AddContact(FoafCollector.this,foafURL).execute();
   }else if (resultCode == RESULT_CANCELED){
        foafURL =	null;
   }
}
}
